name: Linux kernel越界写入漏洞
product: ["Linux Linux kernel 6.14", "Linux Linux kernel >=6.13\uff0c<6.13.5", "Linux Linux kernel 5.15.177", "Linux Linux kernel >=6.1.127\uff0c<6.1.130", "Linux Linux kernel >=6.6.74\uff0c<6.6.80", "Linux Linux kernel >=6.12.11\uff0c<6.12.17", "Linux Linux kernel 5.4.290", "Linux Linux kernel 5.10.234"]
description: Linux kernel是美国Linux基金会的开源操作系统Linux所使用的内核。Linux kernel存在越界写入漏洞，该漏洞源于在删除网络命名空间时多次调用dellink，导致列表损坏。攻击者可利用该漏洞进行进一步恶意操作。
solution:
厂商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：
https://git.kernel.org/stable/c/37e7644b961600ef0beb01d3970c3034a62913af
patch: Linux kernel越界写入漏洞的补丁
